title: Butterie Flip-Top Butter Dish with Matching Spreader (White)
features: WORLD’S ONLY 1-PIECE BUTTER DISH: Butterie is the only butter dish with an attached flip-top lid. By attaching the lid to the base, the lid never touches your butter or your counter. With this simple design improvement, Butterie solves the slippery mess a traditional 2-piece butter dish makes. No lid dragging through the butter and no wondering where to set a messy lid. Butterie is designed for countertop use and it will protect your butter while keeping it soft and easy to spread. HOLDS 8 OUNCES: Butterie’s small, compact size takes up very little counter space, and yet it holds a wide variety of butter stick sizes. It can comfortably hold 8 ounces/2 sticks of butter, or the popular European butters, such as Kerrygold, President, or Plugra. Butterie can also hold a standard block of cream cheese. EASY TO CLEAN: Butterie is dishwasher safe and easy to clean (the attached lid does pop-off). You can run Butterie through the dishwasher dozens of times and it will look as new as the day you bought it. Butterie is made with a high-quality, sturdy, shatterproof, food-safe, BPA-free plastic. If you prefer to keep your Butterie in the refrigerator, it will perform better than any glass or ceramic butter dish since the lid will not fuse together when the butter becomes firm. ADDITIONAL FEATURES: Butterie is women-invented, and includes a hidden, no-mess edge for scraping the butter knife clean. It has a non-slip base so it won’t slide around when you use it. It has wide side handles, making it easy to carry the butter dish from the kitchen to the table, and it has a textured surface to help keep the butter in place. INCLUDES A MATCHING SPREADER: Every Butterie includes a matching spreader that fits in the specially designed cradle on the front of the dish. In addition, each Butterie has an offer to order an extra free spreader in the color of your choice (S&H fees apply).

title: ARIAT Women's Skyline Slip-on Hiking Boot
description: Stay comfortable whenever heading out on adventures or going to the workplace with these Women’s Skyline Slip-on Shoes by Ariat. Designed for women who love to stay active and energetic, these shoes are made with the ATS technology that promises all-day support and long-lasting comfort while the dual-density Duratread outsole provides multi-directional traction design for sure footing in rough terrain. They also provide maximum wear resistance with flexibility and solid footing. The EVA midsole provides lightweight shock absorption and cushioning to the foot, so even if you accidentally step on any hard objects and prevent feeling them as you walk. Skyline is ergonomically designed with a suede and mesh upper to keep your feet breathable. These slip-on shoes for women are complete with some additional and noticeable features like extra wear protection around the toe and heel and mesh lining with a lightly padded collar.
features: 100% Leather Imported Synthetic sole ATS TECHNOLOGY: These women’s shoes are designed with Ariat’s innovative ATS technology that provides superior stability and support with all-day comfort. It helps to keep your feet at ease while outdoors. OPTIMUM COMFORT: These slip-on shoes for women have a soft EVA midsole that offers improved lightweight shock absorption and comfort. The EVA midsole protects your foot even if you accidentally step on any hard objects. DURATREAD OUTSOLE: These women’s slip-on shoes are designed with slip- and oil-resistant, dual-density Duratread outsole for maximum wear-resistance. They offer a multi-directional traction design for solid footing and aggressive grip on any kind of rough terrain. ADDITIONAL FEATURES: These women’s shoes are complete with some remarkable features that include extra wear protection around the toe and heel, mesh lining with a lightly padded collar, and suede and mesh upper. SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions. Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability.
